public_transport_routes.description: Fetches bus routes for the city
public_transport_routes.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (relation["type"="route"]["route"="bus"](area.searchArea);); out body geom; >; out skel qt;

public_transport_stops.description: Fetches bus stops for the city
public_transport_stops.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (node["highway"="bus_stop"](area.searchArea);); out body geom; >; out skel qt;

benches_at_stops.description: Fetches bus stops and checks if they have benches
benches_at_stops.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (node["highway"="bus_stop"](area.searchArea);); out body; out body qt; {{style: node[bench=yes] { color:green; fill-color:green; } node[bench=no], node[!bench] { color:red; fill-color:red; }}}

cycling_pathways.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (way["highway"="cycleway"](area.searchArea); way["bicycle"="designated"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

bicycle_parking.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr["amenity"="bicycle_parking"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

taxi_stations.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr["amenity"="taxi"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

charging_stations.description: Fetches charging stations for electric vehicles
charging_stations.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr["amenity"="charging_station"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

sidewalks.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (way["highway"="footway"](area.searchArea); way["highway"="pedestrian"](area.searchArea); way["footway"="sidewalk"](area.searchArea);); out body geom; >; out skel qt;

crossings.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (node["highway"="crossing"](area.searchArea);); out body geom; >; out skel qt; {{style: node[crossing_ref=zebra] { color:black; symbol-size:10; } node[button_operated=no] { color:red; symbol-size:10; } node[crossing=uncontrolled] { color:green; symbol-size:10; }}}

benches_and_fountains.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (node["amenity"="bench"](area.searchArea); node["amenity"="fountain"](area.searchArea);); out body geom; >; out skel qt; {{style: node[amenity=bench] { color:darkgreen; symbol-size:10; } node[amenity=fountain] { color:red; symbol-size:10; }}}

trees.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (node["natural"="tree"][!"barrier"](area.searchArea);); out body geom; >; out skel qt; {{style: node[natural=tree] { color:darkgreen; }}}

parking_spaces.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (node["amenity"="parking"](area.searchArea); way["amenity"="parking"](area.searchArea); relation["amenity"="parking"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

main_roads.description: Fetches main roads like motorways, trunks, and primary roads
main_roads.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr["highway"="motorway"](area.searchArea); nwr["highway"="trunk"](area.searchArea); nwr["highway"="primary"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

secondary_roads.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr["highway"="secondary"](area.searchArea); nwr["highway"="tertiary"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

service_roads.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr["highway"="residential"](area.searchArea); nwr["highway"="service"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

roads_under_construction.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr["highway"="construction"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

traffic_signals.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr["crossing"="traffic_signals"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

street_lamps.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr["highway"="street_lamp"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt;

traffic_calming.query: [out:json][timeout:50]; area["name"="__CITY__"]->.searchArea; (nwr[~"^traffic_calming$"~".*"](area.searchArea);); out body geom;>;out skel qt; {{style: node[traffic_calming=bump] { color:green; } node[traffic_calming=hump] { color:pink; } node[traffic_calming=island] { color:grey; } node[traffic_calming=rumble_strip] { color:red; }}}
